name: Algo Site Loaders
author: Ruman Ahmed

sections.description:
Algo Site Loaders is a simple loader plugin that can create awesome loader animations for your sites.

A brief Markdown Example

Powerful Features available in Algo Site Loaders

  • Set custom loader animation for your website by choosing the available loaders
  • Easy-to-use settings panel and one clicked configuration.
  • Customization options for the loader’s appearance.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/algo-site-loaders directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Site Loaders -> Settings screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Please make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)

Usage:

  1. Once activated, go to the plugin settings in the WordPress dashboard.
  2. Choose or upload your desired loader animation.
  3. Customize the loader’s appearance and behavior settings.
  4. Save your changes.
sections.faq:
How can I change the loader animation?

You can change the loader animation by accessing the plugin settings in the WordPress dashboard. There, you’ll find options to select a new animation and adjust various settings.

Can I customize the loader’s appearance?

Yes, the plugin provides customization options allowing you to tweak the loader’s appearance, such loader type at this moment, but the color, size, and style are not available now.

Support

If you encounter any issues or have questions, feel free to contact me (algorithmsunlocks@gmail.com).

Contributing

Welcome contributions to improve this plugin. Fork the repository, make your changes, and submit a pull request.

License

This plugin is licensed under the MIT License.
sections.changelog:
2.2.1 (Date: Sep 03, 2024)

  • WordPress tags remove
  • Screenshot updated

2.2.0 (Date: Sep 03, 2024)

  • Improved header style
  • Updated cover photo
  • Updated stable tag
  • Other improvements

2.0.0 (Date: Jun 03, 2024)

  • User Interface updated.
  • Bug Fix: Previous loaders no longer overlap with the current one.
  • Update: Users can easily see which loader is set to the frontend from the backend.
  • Update: Change menu name from site loaders to settings.
  • New: Added a top-level menu for all loaders.
  • Update: Separated all loader pages to improve user experience.
  • Update: About section modified with the WordPress plugin org link.
  • Update: Menu area design change.

1.0.1 (Date: April 25, 2024)

  • Minor Change in the WordPress.Org area.

1.0.0 (Date: April 19, 2024)

  • A change since the previous version.
  • Modify Assets

0.5 (Date: March 28, 2024)

  • List versions from most recent at top to oldest at bottom
